Package vizier

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FilteredData
    A row of data that is sorted
    MagnitudeSort  
    StellarDataRow
    Contains a row of data plus a way of doing a fast compare
    StellarDataTable
    Class that reads and parses VizieR Data Table
    StellarFilteredTable  
    VizierQuery
    Class for querying VizieR catalogue of astronomical catalogues Sample query Default catalogue used is I/311/hip2 - Hipparcos, the New Reduction (van Leeuwen, 2007) Default outputs are as follows
    RArad (deg) (F12.8) Right Ascension in ICRS, Ep=1991.25 [ucd=pos.eq.ra;meta.main]
    DErad (deg) (F12.8) Declination in ICRS, Ep=1991.25 [ucd=pos.eq.dec;meta.main]
    pmRA (mas/yr) (F8.2) Proper motion in Right Ascension [ucd=pos.pm;pos.eq.ra]
    pmDE (mas/yr) (F8.2) Proper motion in Declination [ucd=pos.pm;pos.eq.dec]
    Hpmag (mag) (F7.4) Hipparcos magnitude [ucd=phot.mag;em.opt.V]
    B-V (mag) (F6.3) Colour index [ucd=phot.color;em.opt.B;em.opt.V]

    See http://vizier.u-strasbg.fr/vizier/doc/vizquery.htx for details about query
